headline.main: Hayward's 22 Helps Jazz Keep Pace in West With Win Over Suns
headline.print_headline: Hayward's 22 Helps Jazz Keep Pace in West With Win Over Suns

docs.snippet: Gordon Hayward led five Utah players in double figures with 22 points, and the Jazz boosted their playoff chances with a 101-86 win over the Phoenix Suns on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gordon Hayward led five Utah players in double figures with 22 points, and the Jazz boosted their playoff chances with a 101-86 win over the Phoenix Suns on Sunday.

headline.main: Oil Prices Fall on Dimming Prospect of Output Restraint
headline.print_headline: Oil Prices Fall on Dimming Prospect of Output Restraint

docs.snippet: Oil prices fell in early trading on Monday as the chances of Middle East producers agreeing to curb overproduction appeared to fade, while U.S. output remains stubbornly high....
docs.lead_paragraph: Oil prices fell in early trading on Monday as the chances of Middle East producers agreeing to curb overproduction appeared to fade, while U.S. output remains stubbornly high.

docs.snippet: ROWLEY--Adelaide "Mouse" Storer. Passed away peacefully on March 31 at her home in Chestnut Hill, MA. She was 96. She always put her family first and was devoted to charitable work. Born in New York City in 1920, she was the daughter of Francis E....
docs.lead_paragraph:
ROWLEY--Adelaide "Mouse"

Storer. Passed away peacefully on March 31 at her home in Chestnut Hill, MA. She was 96. She always put her family first and was devoted to charitable work. Born in New York City in 1920, she was the daughter of Francis E. Storer, Sr. and Eleanor Hastings. Educated at Miss Hewitt's Classes in Manhattan, she did volunteer work for the Junior League, Red Cross and other charities during WWII and later was a secretary in the health field. Mrs. Rowley lived in Chicago from 1950 to 1958 and then in the Boston area, where she did volunteer work for numerous charities. Beloved wife of Edward D. Rowley, who preceded her in death, and devoted mother of Maeve Magee; Edward D. Rowley, Jr. (Tina Pope), and Storer H. Rowley (Carolyn Lesh); grandmother of Renana and Dylan Magee, Mary and Elizabeth Rowley and Catharine Rowley, and great-grandmother of three. A memorial service will be held Friday at 1pm at the Church of the Redeemer, Chestnut Hill, MA. In lieu of flowers, please send donations to the MSPCA-Angell, 350 South Huntington Ave., Boston, MA 02130.

docs.snippet: SHATKIN--Evelyn, of Bristol, RI, passed away April 2. A graduate of Emerson College, she had a long career as Evelyn Howe, host of Five O'Clock Follies at CBS, Boston, followed by many decades in Public Relations. Survivors include daughters Susan...
docs.lead_paragraph: SHATKIN--Evelyn, of Bristol, RI, passed away April 2. A graduate of Emerson College, she had a long career as Evelyn Howe, host of Five O'Clock Follies at CBS, Boston, followed by many decades in Public Relations. Survivors include daughters Susan and Joanne Shatkin, sister Janet Dobrer, several nieces and nephews, two grandchildren, one great- grandchild. Predeceased by husband Perry Shatkin, daughter Lenore Richardson Holze, parents Ed and Molly Bergman, brother Walter Bergman. Services today, April 4, Temple Beth El, 70 Orchard St., Providence, RI, 11am. Visiting hours Monday 7-9pm, Tuesday 2-4, 7-9pm. 74 Seabreeze Ln., Bristol, RI. Contributions to Gutterman Religious School Fund, Temple Beth El, or charity of your choice.

docs.snippet: BECK--Esther, passed away on April 2, 2016 after a lengthy illness. She is survived by two children, a daughter-in-law, four grandchildren and three great-grandchildren. She was very loved by her family and will be very much missed. Funeral Servic...
docs.lead_paragraph:
BECK--Esther,

passed away on April 2, 2016 after a lengthy illness. She is survived by two children, a daughter-in-law, four grandchildren and three great-grandchildren. She was very loved by her family and will be very much missed. Funeral Services will be held on Monday, April 4th, at 11am at Sutton Place Synagogue, 225 East 51st Street.

docs.snippet: ROSEN--Jill. Dear Jill, we all miss you. Hope the angels know how to bid. Love from your north and south playmates....
docs.lead_paragraph:
ROSEN--Jill.

Dear Jill, we all miss you. Hope the angels know how to bid. Love from your north and south playmates.
